item.title: [UPDATED] Homeland Security Warns Gov't Shutdown and Lapsed Law Cripple U.S. Cyber Defenses
item.description:

item.title: [UPDATED] URGENT: CISA Orders 7-Day Patch for Actively Exploited FortiWeb Zero-Day
item.description:
Fortinet has disclosed a critical OS command injection zero-day vulnerability, CVE-2025-58034, in its FortiWeb Web Application Firewall (WAF) that is being actively exploited in the wild. The flaw allows an authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying system. In response to...

item.description:

item.title: [UPDATED] Checkout.com Rejects Ransom After ShinyHunters Breach, Donates to Research
item.description:
The global payment processor Checkout.com has disclosed a data breach orchestrated by the ShinyHunters cybercrime group. The attackers exploited a legacy third-party cloud file storage system that was improperly decommissioned. After being contacted with a ransom demand, Checkout.com refused to pay....
